Articles.Content: I'm kinda new at this but I have noticed an island is there a reason I should go to it and how would I get there if you can please attach the thing you got there in your reply. Thanks:cool:
Why don't you go and find out for yourself? Us telling you what you can find there would ruin your own opportunities to discover!

Go and check it out yourself - it's pretty small, but it's real neat. There's an air traffic control tower which you can see from far away, I climbed up inside it and planted a flag There's also some other neat goodies hidden around there, but you'll have to see them for yourself.

Best thing is that you don't need a large ship to reach it.
build a plane and fly over
Fly a in-game example 'stock' air-craft, call "The albatross". Just fly slow, and low, once near there cut all the engines, and try land on the runway.

>There is an island

>Playing KSP

>Makes a thread on the forums instead of flying there

Seriously?
>using le meme arrows outside our secret club.
land and learn my friend land and learn.

Nope... I am not Spoiling this.

Take the biggest rocket you can find. Launch it and gimble your flightpath just over the horizon in direction of the Island. Punch your way through the atmosphere and eject your pod when you are right over it. Dont forget to pack some Parachutes
There are 5 Kerbals there from a ship wreak, they made weird things out of coconuts.....
Build a basic plane and launch yourself over there. Should be about a 5 minute journey if you fly slow.
Wilson!!!!

There are 5 Kerbals there from a ship wreak, they made weird things out of coconuts.....

And for some bizarre reason, one of them is singing about their linear arrangement.

>There is an island

>Playing KSP

>Makes a thread on the forums instead of flying there

Seriously?

Each to their own.

How about trying to get there and land with only 3 parts.

Each to their own.

How about trying to get there and land with only 3 parts.

Best I can do is get there and land with 1,300 parts.

Best I can do is get there and land with 1,300 parts.

I asume you mean that that's the smallest you've ever made it?
What do you expect? It's whackjob, he doesn't know the meaning of small, or even medium or large. Only Humongous, Gigantic and any other synonyms associated with the two.

Nope... I am not Spoiling this.

Take the biggest rocket you can find. Launch it and gimble your flightpath just over the horizon in direction of the Island. Punch your way through the atmosphere and eject your pod when you are right over it. Dont forget to pack some Parachutes

What if he cannot steer airplanes, like me?

What if he cannot steer airplanes, like me?

Then there is an opportunity to learn that would be missed by avoiding ever using planes.

Then there is an opportunity to learn that would be missed by avoiding ever using planes.

What if we can't find any airplane tutorials?
Hah! Can't find tutorials! Hahahaha! You're a funny guy, you know that?

What if we can't find any airplane tutorials?

Maybe you aren't looking hard enough?

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=KSP+plane+tutorials
Trial and error, my friend, trial and error. Airplanes are fun to build and fly.
Alternatively, you swim there with a Kerbal.

Hah! Can't find tutorials! Hahahaha! You're a funny guy, you know that?

I'm serious.

Googled for "How to fly airplanes in KSP". Got tutorials on how to build spaceplanes.

See, it's arrogant posts like this that makes me dislike the KSP community; too arrogant and self-centered.

Maybe you aren't looking hard enough?

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=KSP+plane+tutorials

Ironically, I got no results on how to fly airplanes. Again, only how to build and fly spaceplanes(for .18, even).
